column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////They shouldn't call it "deep dish pizza".  They should call it "thick crust pizza"  Someone told me that it was their style
column2: having the crust thicker than the rest of the cheese and toppings
column3: but sorely disappointed.  All the other deep dish pizzas I had were filled with toppings and cheese
column4: but I felt like all I ate was crust.
